head.title: Page Not Found | U.S. Department of the Treasury

div.class: clearfix text-formatted field field--name-body field--type-text-with-summary field--label-hidden field__item

div.p: The radical left has chosen to shut down the United States government in the name of reckless spending and obstructionism. As a result, the U.S. Department of the Treasury’s websites will only be sporadically updated until this shutdown concludes. Please refer to Treasury’s contingency plans for more information.

section.aria-label: Official website of the United States government

div.p: An official website of the United States government

Official websites use .gov
A .gov website belongs to an official government organization in the United States.

Secure .gov websites use HTTPS
A lock (LockA locked padlock) or https:// means you’ve safely connected to the .gov website. Share sensitive information only on official, secure websites.
